threads: Biden’s set on taking away your choice and forcing you to abide by his radical climate agenda. Un-American!
text: what choice do we have anymore? feels like everything's being decided for us. just more control, less freedom. miss the days when personal responsibility mattered more than being babysat by the government. it's all just so tiring.
